home.starter: Attract new customers by promoting your business anywhere on the Internet: Google, OpenStreetMap, Bing, Here, TomTom, Yelp and Foursquare.
home.reasonText: Today every third internet search is linked to a local activity, e.g. if you search for your activity on Google (e.g. `Vegan Restaurant Leipzig`). Internet users searching for facilities like yours do not necessarily visit your site and often use information published by third-party sites such as Google, OpenStreetMap, Bing, Here, TomTom, Yelp, Foursquare. It is therefore imperative to refer you to these sites!
home.analysisTitle: Analyze the visibility of your business in 2 minutes.

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.titleText: Quickly correct you Digital visibility with LocalVue.
Pricing.titleText2: The additional links to the partners allow to add new features or correct their entries if they are inexact.
